review: This device is the best. Who needs smart TV!!!
author: Saovik Mondal

review: Nice, but maybe I expected more. i.e. Chrome function 'share desktop' doesn't work so fluent.
author: SebaSS_cl

review: Funciona de forma perfeita. It's working perfect.
author: Juarez Soares

review: This was my second Chromecast purchased for myself (I've bought two others as gifts). I love my Chromecasts; they are the primary means by which I use my television these days. There can be connectivity issues at times, but I think those are more related to my low-mid-range phone (Sharp AQUOS Crystal) than the Chromecast, as we've never had issues when controlling it using my wife's higher-end phone (Moto X).
author: Eric Leadbetter
